name: LedgerMaster
0:
”Alexa start ledger Master and show me the ledger”
”Who borrowed my pen”
”John borrowed my pen.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ledger master
des:
Do you trouble to remember the names of all the friends who have borrowed items from you? Do you lent stuff and forget? Not now. Now you can maintain the list of all your borrowed items in your personal ledger with the help of ledger Master.
You can add and delete items as per requirements. 
You can see all the items borrowed by your friends.
